name: Wyvern Wars
description:
Wyvern Wars is an action shoot 'em up game where you join Cara and Dorg as they attempt to fight off evil creatures encroaching on their home. Fly across the skies, blasting baddies and collecting power-ups to unlock Dorg's true potential and save your home.

This was my first semester project at the University of Florida and want to share it with peers and those who enjoy the shmup genre. This is the first game I've made almost entirely autonomously, creating all of the hand-drawn art assets and scripts. Some vfx and sound effects were borrowed from the asset store, and I've sourced the music from the Shovel Knight soundtrack by Jake Kaufman.

Please give me some feedback on the project -- it is far from perfect and quite short and I intend to work on it some more in my free time.

Special thanks to the Digital Worlds Institute for help with troubleshooting and the dialogue system in the game as well as a thank you to everyone who takes the time to download and play my little project.

Compatible with Windows only.

Borrowed Assets:

"Dragonslapper" Font

69 Game Over Jingles Pack

8-Bit SFX

Free Casual Game SFX Pack

Vertical 2D Shooting Assets Pack
